      • createNobilityTitle

        public static NobilityTitle createNobilityTitle(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                java.lang.String suffix,
                                                java.lang.String adjective,
                                                java.lang.String language)
        Create a character title with the different option you want. If an option is null, it will be generate randomly.
        Parameters:
        prefix - : If null, created randomly
        suffix - : If null, created randomly
        adjective - : If null, created randomly
        language - : The language you want to use for the creation. Uses the one of FileAccess.
        Returns:
        the NobilityTitle generated

      • getPrefix

        private static java.lang.String getPrefix(java.lang.String prefix,
                                          java.lang.String language)
        If needed, get a random prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - : If null, generate a new one
        language - : The generation language
        Returns:
        the prefix

      • getSuffix

        private static java.lang.String getSuffix(java.lang.String suffix,
                                          java.lang.String language)
        If needed, get a random suffix. There is 3 chances out of 5 to generate one.
        Parameters:
        suffix - : If null, generate a new one
        language - : The generation language
        Returns:
        the suffix

      • getAdjective

        private static java.lang.String getAdjective(java.lang.String adjective,
                                             java.lang.String language)
        If needed, get a random adjective. There is 3 chances out of 5 to generate one.
        Parameters:
        adjective - : If null, generate a new one
        language - : The generation language
        Returns:
        the adjective
